page.title: 07SWAN GARAGE, WESTON.
page.content: From a{Taxi and Car Hire}business there has now been developed a garage business , motor and lorry repairs. There is a{24 hour heavy and light {breakdown service,}which serves the A1 Stevenage Motorway, and extends to Welwyn in the south, and Sandy in the north. Now called{Swan Garage}it is named after a pub that was built in Weston but is not there any more. There is also a Swan Garage in Hitchin another depot for heavy vehicles. The partners in this business have lived in the village for years and the garage is very much a family concern. The men work long hours because it is a 24 hour service. Swan Garage is also a petrol{filling station,}there are two pumps. The first hand crank petrol pump in Weston has now been moved to Fairclough Hall Farm at Halls Green.
